cards.title: Charade
powers: Either put a card from your hand under this card or put a card from under this card into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select an environment card. It deals one target 2 fire damage.

openingLines.default: Approaching target now, authorizing switch to live fire.

cards.title: Betsy
body: When this card enters play, if it was not played from your hand, {Charade} deals one target 2 irreducible psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Betsy and I are going to introduce ourselves to our unwanted guests.

cards.title: DV-64 Scion
body: When this card enters play, if it was not played from your hand, {Charade} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage.
powers: {Charade} deals up to two targets 2 projectile damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: The DV-64: our standard firearm.{BR}I'm sure you're familiar with it and will{BR}want to make your own modifications.

cards.title: Empty the Magazine
body: Discard any number of cards from under your character card.
{Charade} deals one target X projectile damage, where X is 3 plus the number of cards discarded this way.
Draw a card.

cards.title: Explosive Sabotage
body: When this card enters play, if it was not played from your hand, the environment deals up to two targets 2 fire damage each.
Destroy an ongoing or environment card.

cards.title: Gather Intel
body: Put up to two cards from your hand under your character card.
Draw until you have three cards in hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Alycia Chin? In [b]my[/b] building?!{BR}Wearing [b]my[/b] courier company's uniform?{BR}What do I pay you people for?!

cards.flavorReference: Rex Tyran, Tyran: Corporate Ladder Limited Series

cards.title: Glorious Battle
body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.

flavorQuotes.text: You never knew when to quit,{BR}Alycia. Still trying to live up to the Master's ideals of glorious battle?

cards.title: "Hello, Hero"
body: Select another hero.
If you played this card from your hand, {Charade} deals that hero 2 irreducible psychic damage.
That hero's player draws a card then plays a card or uses a power.

flavorQuotes.text: Alycia suddenly appearing and{BR}harshly critiquing you before disappearing{BR}again just means she's warming up to you.

cards.title: Hidden Cache
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until two equipment cards are revealed.
Put one revealed equipment card either into play or under your character card, then discard the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: How many more times must I hear{BR}this speech, father?

cards.title: Hovercycle
body: When this card is destroyed, put a card other than Hovercycle from under your character card into play.
powers: {Charade} deals one target 2 melee damage. Draw a card.
{Charade} deals up to two targets 2 fire damage each. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: The tech teams recovered one of the{BR}Azure Empire forces' personal aircraft.{BR}Care to take it for a spin?

cards.title: Legacy of Terror
body: Put a card from your hand under your character card.
Play a card or use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm worried about her. She{BR}made excuses, but I think all this stuff with her father has her on edge.

cards.flavorReference: Summer Newman, Heir of Chin One-shot

cards.title: Reckless Escalation
body: Discard a card from under your character card.
Put up to two card from under your character card into play or put up to two cards from your trash under your character card.

flavorQuotes.text: The [b]window[/b]?! I swear{BR}you've been pulling these stunts on{BR}purpose since you found out about my heart medication.

cards.title: Shock and Awe
body: Increase damage dealt by {Charade} by 1 until the end of the turn.
{Charade} deals one target 1 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Ha, another Division twerp?{BR}Think [b]you[/b] can stop me?!

cards.title: Stun Baton
body: When this card enters play, if it was not played from your hand, reduce the next damage dealt to {Charade} by 2.
powers: {Charade} deals one target 1 lightning damage. Reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Choosing non-lethal options? I'm surprised, Ms. Chin.

cards.flavorReference: Agent Parker, The Menagerie Secret Origins #13

cards.title: Targeting Visor
body: Play this card next to a non-hero target. Then if this card was not played from your hand, reveal the top card of that target's deck and replace or discard it.
Damage dealt by {Charade} to that target is irreducible.

flavorQuotes.text: Okay, let's try that again{BR}without your toys.

cards.flavorReference: Tango One, Gun Club Limited Series

cards.title: Three Steps Ahead
body: Whenever you put a card into play from anywhere other than your hand, {Charade} regains 1 hp.
At the end of your turn, if you put a card under your character card this turn, draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Alycia Chin, designation scion,{BR}daughter of terrorist Achilles chin.{BR}Turned herself in to Division 3, which I must assume is part of some scheme.

cards.flavorReference: Agent Parker, The Menagerie Secret Origins #12
